description: Alessandro has called a meeting with his former boyfriend Tucker to hash out a few things and maybe get back together with him. Tucker has had a rough past with relationships and Alessandro once again proves that all Men are dogs. Alessandro has to get down on his knees and basically beg for Tucker back. Tucker very hesitant about the whole situation slowly gives into Alessandro's magical whims as he suddenly falls under his spell and begins to suck on his gorgeous uncut cock. Tucker missed having it deep in his throat but most of all he missed pleasing his former boyfriend. Alessandro knows this could be his last chance with him so he fucks him slowly and passionately to show Tucker that he cares and can still please him in all ways possible. They slowly build up their balls full of cum and let it loose together but hopefully not the last time.Enjoy!
title: Second Go
